content: This section contains all my current projects.
title: Projects

content:
Hugo ships with several built-in shortcodes for rich content, along with a privacy config and a set of simple shortcodes that enable static and no-JS versions of various social media embeds.
YouTube #Below is an example using the built-in youtube shortcode. It requires only the video ID.
X (formerly Twitter) #This example uses the x shortcode to output a Tweet. It requires two named parameters user and id.
“In addition to being more logical, asymmetry has the advantage that its complete appearance is far more optically effective than symmetry.”
— Jan Tschichold pic.twitter.com/gcv7SrhvJb
— Design Reviewed | Graphic Design History (@DesignReviewed) January 17, 2019 Instagram #The instagram shortcode will embed an Instagram post. It requires only the post ID.
View this post on Instagram Vimeo #The vimeo shortcode will embed a Vimeo video. It requires only the video ID.
summary: This is an example of a rich content summary.
title: Rich Content
